Text: This is the real deal! Hell yes!!!!

I can't believe I couldn't wait the last 22 hours.  Had to DL it.  I blame the Vin Mariani.  I pre-ordered the vinyl.  Thank you for making a fourth album.  I wasn't too sure that was going to happen--
Thanks. Superb. Always Malaise (The Man I Am) is Interpol at their darkest and most mysterious. Love it!
